ack.p: UK Catalysis Hub is kindly thanked for resources and support provided via our membership of the UK Catalysis Hub Consortium and funded by EPSRC grant: EP/R026939/1, EP/R026815/1, EP/R026645/1, EP/R027129/1. Computations were performed on facilities operated by Advanced Research Computing at Cardiff (ARCCA) on behalf of the Supercomputing Wales (SCW) project, which is part-funded by the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) via the Welsh Government, and also performed on the UK ARCHER High Performance Computing facility through our membership of the UK's HPC Materials Chemistry Consortium (MCC), which is funded by EPSRC grant (EP/L000202). SAFN wishes to thank the School of Chemistry, Cardiff University for a studentship. The authors thank Prof. Russell F. Howe and Dr Alex J. O'Malley for the fruitful discussion on room temperature methoxylation, and Dr Thomas W. Keal for advice on performing QM/MM calculations with deuterated species.
